entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Fog dissipating early this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
